CustomField.defaultValue: IF (DATEVALUE(NOW()) >= DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) && DATEVALUE(NOW()) < DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7), 2, 1)
CustomField.label: Fecha GMT
